name: Raspberry Pi
description:
Raspberry Pi


This is something I will be working on! Basically I am making a mini portable server. Reasons to use-

  1. Mini Server that runs on mobile data and power bank
  2. Web Server
  3. Mail Server
  4. File Server
  5. Decentralised/Peer to Peer Network


Updates will follow


You can soon find the Gerber Files and 3D Files in my website- Bishal Saha
